plot: Ryo Saeba is the City Hunter, a "sweeper" (private detective) in the city of Tokyo. He and his sidekick Kaori Makimura are hired by desperate people with major problems. When he's not keeping the streets clean, Ryo is chasing the ladies, and Kaori chases after him with a giant anti-ecchi hammer.
ending_theme: "Atsuku Naretara" (熱くなれたら; If I Could Become Passionate) by Kiyomi Suzuki
